评论概述: Oddly-shaped to me but may work for some people
评论详情: I ordered this in a medium because prior Cherokee scrub tops in a size small were always too narrow in the shoulders and fine elsewhere, and I wanted an overall loose scrub top.  However, this style had almost too much room in the shoulders, but was extremely tight and narrow over my relatively small waist, and then clung way down past my already quite long torso.  I think it might work better for people with more of the upside-down triangle body type, or who are just uniformly tall and narrow all over.

This are nice but they don’t have a lot of stretch in them like the other ones they have no stretchy side Panels or back panels so if you are curvy then will fit snug so definitely size up in this style and they are tight in the arms and the shoulder stick up like if you have shoulder pads. But if you are a stick figure then they would be fine if not and shaped like a real women then I’d size up in this top

评论概述: If you’re looking for a scrub top with a little extra room and length, this is it!
评论详情: Cherokee is a great brand, hands down. The material is great, soft, no pilling in areas that other scrubs just after a few wears start to show signs of friction. The one thing I don’t like about this particular top is all the extra material in the front belly/waist area. It seems to be longer than other Cherokee scrub tops too that I have purchased in the past. It could almost pass for a maternity scrub top for the first several months of pregnancy if you are not looking for a typical maternity scrub top.
The quality is great as usual from Cherokee Infinity scrubs. I didn’t feel that it was mentioned that these run smaller than other large scrubs. They do fit but snuggly.

I originally ordered the other V-neck scrub top in the infinity series however it fit kind of like a maternity shirt. I made sure this top was the "contemporary" fit which is much more flattering for me as the bottom is a more fitted and doesn't flare out. Per usual with the infinity series, I love the breathable material that is super comfortable.
Return was easy HOWEVER- the instructions were to email a tracking # to them but an email address was not provided.

I'm 140 lb 5'4" bought a size small which is my usual size in scrubs and this shirt fit so strangely. It was fine up top but the hem came down below my crotch and there are slits on either side of it that make the bottom fan out so it looked like a really short dress. Will be returning.
Love the fabric, love the fit ! Wish it came in Galaxy Blue
Very comfortable with streatch inserts.
Excellent quality, fit as expected

This scrub top is super comfy and stretchy. I ordered my normal scrub size, and it fit as expected (form-fitting but not tight). The color is great as well.
